attributes.review: Do NOT download! If you find yourself downloading it, terrible things can happen to you! For instance, I downloaded it and felt a deep pain in my chest and heart area! I of course rushed to the emergency room and the doctor told me that I had a heart attack! I thought nothing of it being connected to the app at first but then as I tried to open the app again, a hot air balloon came crashing down out of the sky and landed on me! Luckily everyone in it was ok but unfortunately I was not. My granddaughter is typing this because most of my body is paralyzed. I made one more attempt to open the app which caused me to finally know the app was causing these terrible things. As I opened the app for the 3rd and now final time... my *private area* shrunk. I went from the length the ladies would drop their jaws too.... to almost nonexistent. Just barely there to do my business. The doctors talked about naming this trump syndrome but I don’t think he will be happy.
attributes.userName: take a stand for whats right
attributes.title: TERRIBLY BAD THINGS HAPPEN

attributes.review: 😔The app was Bad nothing good was on it and I didn’t see oranges on there I was sad 😞. And after that my cat was going crazy when I downloaded it she was talking gibberish and it was freaking me out I was scared but then out of nowhere my mom turned white was in shock 😱 I didn’t know what to do so I was doing research and it say the app has something to do with it I had to delete the app so I can be free from all this crazy stuff but I would miss my oranges 🍊 so I decide to keep it tho and my cat stopped talking gibberish but then turned into a dog 🐶 I was like wth is happening to me and my mom turned back to her self which I was happy but confused on how too 🤷🏽 the next the day I decided to stalk orange on the app 🍊 and he was there but I saw his nudes which were crazy and nice I love me oranges 🍊 the day after I decided it was time to delete app and which I did and everything turned back to normal 😯crazy 3 days that happen 🤪
attributes.title: The story of a app 😋

attributes.review: If I could I would give it zero stars. But I can’t do that so one star will have to do for now. When I downloaded the app I got a really bad headache like no joke😂 I got out of the app and went to TikTok and suddenly I was getting these weird videos encouraging me to vote for Trump. I was ✨disgusted✨. I then left my phone alone for a few minutes to go get some food from the kitchen and everything was covered with Trump 2020. I screamed and ran back to my room but it o my got worse. I started seeing random figures whispering “Trump 2020” and they got louder and louder until they were practically screaming 🙀 . I yelled back “NO!” and they started talking in this weird alien language🧐 Out of nowhere a hole appeared in the ceiling and a bright light 💡 was shining down on me. I started to float upwards slowly and then I realized that I was being KIDNAPPED BY ALIENS 👽 OMG 😱 I am now being held hostage by these weird Trump looking aliens 👾 Please send help, I am begging you 🥺

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to pay our favorite orange 🍊 a visit. first when i opened the app, there was an monkey 🐵 i didn’t want to see a monkey 😡 i am still mad 😡. but it gets worse as soon as i left the app, my home screen was the orange 🍊 working out 🏋️! it was horrific 😱 i screamed and threw my phone 📱 causing my phone to break 💔 so you owe me a phone 📱 i’ll take the new one ☝️. next after my phone cracked, someone broke into my house 🏠! i couldn’t call 911 because my phone 📱was destroyed 😣 next thing i know there’s a clown 🤡 , the clown killed 🔫 my family and took me to clown town 🏘 clown town was terrifying ✨ there were just a lot of directioners 🆔 i thought i belonged there. just a message from god. ✝️ . but turns out, we were all going to die! 💀! we found out that the clowns 🤡 the real killer clowns 🤡 were gonna kill us. not all were upset 😢 but we all just wanted to be flipped off by louis before he die ☠️ so louis flipped is off 🖕 then right as we were going to die, harry saved us. we were all chilling 😎 with the one and only one direction, so some died. ☺️ so now my only family is them. this app only got one star because i met one direction. but moral of the story is , some mistakes get made that’s alright that’s ok, but this app is a huge mistake and would not recommend. have a nice day mr orange 🍊😉🧚✨💗😍

attributes.review:
I got this app because I wanted to help support the man who has let hundreds of thousands of people die of Covid-19, attempted to strip LGBTQIA people of their rights, and is enforcing his psychotic racist ideologies. I thought I could download this app to help him 🥺👉🏽👈🏽
But then when I did download it, Trump suddenly appeared in my room and told me that in order for him to win in 2020, we’d need to run away together and start a new life. I told him “no ew you’re stinky and orange” and he got so mad 😡 and slapped me and said I was a crusty little nobody 🥺🥺🥺
I was about to run away cwying and then Pence-senpai came running in. I thought he was going to help me escape from the meanie cheetoh but instead he told me “you’re going to hell, you nasty lezbean” 🤬 and he and trump laughed and then they gazed deeply into each other’s eyes and started kissing. 🥺🤧😭
I pwojectile vomited🤮on them , but they kept going at it and so I deleted the app and they vanished into thin air. 
Worst app ever. 😤😖😣

attributes.review: I got the app to support our wonderful racist homophobic white supremacist president but it took almost A MONTH to download and as soon as I opened the app they asked for my social security number and address!!😡 The app then proceeded to harass me with notifications THAT I DID NOT ALLOW saying things along the lines of “Are you lost babygirl?” and “TAP HERE TO JOIN EPSTEIN AND TRUMPS NEW ISLAND ON ANIMAL CROSSING” I am in such disbelief that apple would let an app like this be open to the public. To make matters worse I contacted customer service on the app and got on the phone with them only to hear children crying for help!! Then after having the app for only 2 days now they got my address and came to my house and started beating my 89 year old grandmother with candy canes while waving confederate flags and singing ”RAH RAH ROLL UP TO THE PARTY WITH MY CRAZY PINK WIG BUT I CANT GET THROUGH THE DOOR BECAUSE MY BOOTYS TOO BIG”🤬🤬 I AM OUTRAGED AT THE DEVELOPERS WHO MADE THIS APP TO SAY THE LEAST AND IT NEEDS TO BE TAKEN DOWN IMMEDIATELY!!!😡😤

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible

attributes.review: Ugh, so first this app took my grandparent’s plus my parent’s entire LIFESPAN to download. 😒I WISH I was using figurative language but I’m not. So when the app FINALLY did download something strange happened. 🧐 Hmm, I couldn’t really figure out what was on my screen. It looked like multiple things. I saw an orange, homophobic, racist, sexist, rapist clown. I don’t know why it was orange.  At the same time I also saw a Cheeto??? Somebody help me understand what it was!!!! I ALSO saw a GOLDFISH CRACKER!!!!! It all looked the same to me. The goldfish cracker looked evil though. 😧 After seeing all of that the clown thing wanted my phone number. He has a wife that’s so messed up! He was only almost 30 when she was born but that’s okay!! When I gave my phone number I was getting texts by a white cisgender male who is homophobic, racist, sexist, etc., I think it was the president! I can’t leak too much but I can say he is for sure cheating on his wife with other children!!!!!!!
attributes.title: a MAD person

attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD. I downloaded this app one day only to wake up in the middle of the night to see Trump’s face on the screen, he was watching me! It was creepy af and I immediately turned off my phone. The next morning I thought it was just a dream so I didn’t delete the app, only to have the same thing happen again the next night! When I deleted the app, an hour late there were agents of the FBI at my door requesting to speak with me. They said I was suspected of committing treason?! Tf! I informed them of why I deleted the app and that I didn’t see how that could possibly be treason and if anything Trump should be getting interviewed not me, but they didn’t listen. I immediately sprinted out the front door and now I’m on the run all because I downloaded this stupid app. Do. Not. Download. And to the fat, pedophilic cheeto in the White House, I would’ve thought you’d have learned not to mess with Gen Z by now sweetie. Enjoy your ratings. 😘
